title: vintage style (number) typeface
content:
Hello,

I want a typeface that will has a nice number 4. I need it to look sort of farm house vintage to go along with the photo for this food mag cover I am working on which has that feel to it.

thanks in advance for your suggestions
author: shielddesign

comments.content:
perhaps check out the numbers typeface [http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100018](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020154207/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100018 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100018")

it's a very helpful typeface for your issue.
feldhouse...great suggestion...I love it. Now if I could only afford it!
Emigre's Mrs Eaves has a nice No 4
